short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Declutter tabs and bookmarks; achieve tab zero - finally!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab0 helps you keep your browser tidy by providing a single place to access and read your links on all your internet-enabled devices.

Auto-Clear Unused Links: With Tab0, any link you haven't checked out in 30 days will be automatically removed. This helps keep your list clean and focused on what you really need.

Simple and Clean Design: Enjoy a distraction-free reading experience with Tab0's minimalistic interface. It's designed to make reading your links as easy as possible.

Save Your Links: If you're worried about losing a link, Tab0 lets you export your links as HTML. This way, you can import them back to Chrome or switch to Chrome bookmarks whenever you want.

AI Summaries: it comes with free AI summarizing feature. It provides a brief summary of your articles, so you can get the gist without having to spend too much time.

In a nutshell, Tab0 is a straightforward, user-friendly extension that makes managing your browser tabs a breeze. Please reach out to our support team if you have any questions.
